thread.title: Pat Robertson Applauds Man Who Barred Grandson's Boyfriend From Thanksgiving Dinner
thread.title_full: Pat Robertson Applauds Man Who Barred Grandson's Boyfriend From Thanksgiving Dinner - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Pat Robertson Applauds Man Who Barred Grandson's Boyfriend From Thanksgiving Dinner
text: Pat Robertson is gearing up for the holidays by expressing more anti-gay rhetoric. The conservative televangelist praised a " 700 Club " viewer this week for telling his gay grandson that he couldn't bring his "friend" to Thanksgiving dinner ,
